text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the morning light
City's buzzing feels so bright
Street sounds like a sweet symphony
Life is calling gotta be me

[Verse 2]
Coffee brewing smell the air
People moving everywhere
Every step's a beat in time
In this world we all can shine

[Chorus]
Dance to the city's tune
Underneath the glowing moon
Every heartbeat sings
In this place we find our wings

[Verse 3]
Kids are laughing in the park
Sun is shining till it's dark
Joy is painting every face
Love can find us anyplace

[Bridge]
In the chaos there's a song
We all get to sing along
Harmony in every glance
Life's a rhythm let's just dance

[Chorus]
Dance to the city's tune
Underneath the glowing moon
Every heartbeat sings
In this place we find our wings
title: Sweet Symphony
